radiographic_examinations.findings: T2-isointense to T2-hyperintense, enhancing soft-tissue mass (1.4 cm by 2.6 cm by 3.3 cm) involving the right posterolateral wall of the lower rectum and upper anal canal; lymphadenopathy involving the right pelvic sidewall, with the largest node measuring 11 mm in short-axis diameter.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed Tomography (CT) of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Enhancing soft-tissue mass and lymphadenopathy involving the right pelvic sidewall; no evidence of distant metastases.
